nodes.text: H1-R1 was a droid used by the Eternal Alliance on the planet Odessen capable of recordkeeping purposes.

H1-R1 appeared in Star Wars: The Old Republic: Knights of the Eternal Throne in the mission "An Error in Alliance Records." The mission was available for players who romanced Lana Beniko to allow the player to clarify their relationship status because of a bug that caused the game to not reflect their relationship accurately.
